environments.title: Environments
environments.subtitle: Manage your LeRobot environments and dependencies.
environments.noEnvironments: No environments found. Create one to get started.
environments.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this environment? This action cannot be undone.

repoSelection.title: Select Repository
repoSelection.subtitle: Choose your environment source code repository.
repoSelection.addCustom: Want to add a new repository? Go to

versionSelection.title: Select Version
versionSelection.subtitle: Choose LeRobot version tag or branch.

hardwareSelection.title: Hardware Acceleration
hardwareSelection.subtitle: Configure PyTorch acceleration settings.
hardwareSelection.compatibilityNote: We will automatically select the most compatible PyTorch and acceleration library (CUDA/ROCm) versions for your hardware.
hardwareSelection.cpuWarning: Running on CPU will be significantly slower for training and inference.

extrasSelection.title: Optional Components
extrasSelection.subtitle: Select additional components to install.
extrasSelection.allDescription: Automatically install all available extra components (recommended for full experience).

nameConfig.title: Environment Name
nameConfig.subtitle: Configure environment identifier.
nameConfig.internalNameHelp: Only letters, numbers, dots, dashes, and underscores allowed.
nameConfig.friendlyNameHelp: Name shown in the environment list.
nameConfig.duplicateError: Environment name already exists. Please choose another one.
nameConfig.formatError: Internal name can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, dots, dashes, and underscores.

review.title: Review & Create
review.subtitle: Review your configuration before creation.
review.internetWarning: Note: This process requires an active internet connection to download dependencies (~2GB).
review.advancedWarning: Warning: Modifying commands may cause installation failure. Proceed with caution.

cancelDialog.title: Cancel Environment Creation
cancelDialog.message: Are you sure you want to cancel? All configuration will be lost.

navigationWarning.title: Leave Page
navigationWarning.message: You have an incomplete environment creation. Are you sure you want to leave? Unsaved configuration will be lost.

installation.title: Installing Environment
installation.subtitle: Setting up {{envName}}. Please do not close this window.
installation.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel the installation?

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your application preferences and configuration.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the look and feel of the application.

paths.title: Paths
paths.dataDirDescription: Main directory for all application data.
paths.dataDirLocked: Cannot be changed after creating environments.

tools.title: Tools
tools.gitPathPlaceholder: Git executable path (e.g., /usr/bin/git or C:\Program Files\Git\bin\git.exe)
tools.bundledDescription: Use the Git installed on your system.

repositories.title: LeRobot Repositories
repositories.name: Name
repositories.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the repository "{{name}}"?
repositories.saveBeforeDownload: Please save the configuration before downloading this repository

pypi.title: PyPI Mirrors
pypi.description: Manage PyPI mirror sources for faster package installation. Enable one mirror to use it, or keep all disabled to use official PyPI.
pypi.name: Name
pypi.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the PyPI mirror "{{name}}"?

huggingface.title: HuggingFace
huggingface.tokenHelp: Optional: Access token for private repositories or higher rate limits.

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.installationTimeoutDescription: Timeout in seconds for tool installation (default: 3600)
advanced.logLevelDescription: Set the verbosity of application logs

messages.saveError: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
messages.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to defaults? Your data directory will be preserved if environments exist.
messages.dataDirLocked: Data directory cannot be changed after creating environments.
